joxy.border

Class JoxyBevelBorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.border.AbstractBorder
      • javax.swing.border.BevelBorder
        • joxy.border.JoxyBevelBorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Border

    public class JoxyBevelBorder
extends BevelBorder
    This class implements a more KDE-like variant of the BevelBorder.

    We try to substitute Joxy-specific borders for the default Java Swing borders in the JoxyPanelUI class.

    Author:
    Thom Castermans, Willem Sonke
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • JoxyBevelBorder

        public JoxyBevelBorder(int type)
        Creates a new Joxy bevel border of the specified type. Contrary to the BevelBorder, it is not possible to set the colours manually.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the border, either BevelBorder.LOWERED (produces a "lowered" border) or BevelBorder.RAISED (a "raised" border).
